text: Baron Walter Louis Davis (born April 13, 1979 in Los Angeles, California) is a professional basketball player who currently plays for the New York Knicks of the NBA. He played college basketball at UCLA. Davis has also played in the NBA for the Charlotte/New Orleans Hornets from 1999 to 2005, the Golden State Warriors from 2005 to 2008, the Los Angeles Clippers from 2008 to 2011 and the Cleveland Cavaliers in 2011. ==Other websites== *Official website *NBA player profile Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Cleveland Cavaliers players Category:Golden State Warriors players Category:Los Angeles Clippers players Category:New Orleans Hornets players Category:New York Knicks players Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles
title: Baron Davis
